name: ChatWindowConfiguration
type: class
memorycategory: Instances
summary: |
  Configures properties of the default chat window.
description: |
  Configures properties of the default text chat window. It is parented to
  Class.TextChatService.
codesamples: []
inherits:
  - TextChatConfigurations
descendants: []
tags:
  - NotCreatable
deprecationmessage: ''
properties:
  - name: ChatWindowConfiguration.AbsolutePosition
    summary: |
      Actual screen position of the default chat window, in pixels.
    description: |
      Read-only property that provides the screen position of the default chat
      window in pixels. Behaves similarly to Class.GuiBase2d.AbsolutePosition.
    codesamples: []
    type: Vector2
    tags:
      - ReadOnly
      - NotReplicated
    deprecationmessage: ''
    security:
      read: None
      write: None
    threadsafety: Unsafe
    category: Data
    serialization:
      canload: false
      cansave: false
    capabilities:
      - Chat
  - name: ChatWindowConfiguration.AbsoluteSize
    summary: |
      Actual screen size of the default chat window, in pixels.
    description: |
      Read-only property that provides the screen size of the default chat
      window in pixels. Behaves similarly to Class.GuiBase2d.AbsoluteSize.
    codesamples: []
    type: Vector2
    tags:
      - ReadOnly
      - NotReplicated
    deprecationmessage: ''
    security:
      read: None
      write: None
    threadsafety: Unsafe
    category: Data
    serialization:
      canload: false
      cansave: false
    capabilities:
      - Chat
  - name: ChatWindowConfiguration.BackgroundColor3
    summary: |
      Background color of the default chat window.
    description: |
      Background color of the default chat window. If the background color is
      not overridden, this value will respect the user's
      Class.GuiService.PreferredTransparency by making the menu more gray as
      the transparency of the menu decreases. Default value is
      Datatype.Color3|Color3.new(25, 27, 29).
    codesamples: []
    type: Color3
    tags: []
    deprecationmessage: ''
    security:
      read: None
      write: None
    threadsafety: ReadSafe
    category: Appearance
    serialization:
      canload: true
      cansave: true
    capabilities:
      - Chat
  - name: ChatWindowConfiguration.BackgroundTransparency
    summary: |
      Background transparency of the default chat window.
    description: |
      Background transparency of the default chat window as a number between 0
      and 1. This value is multiplied with the user's
      Class.GuiService.PreferredTransparency to create the effective
      background transparency used by the chat window, which may be more opaque
      than this value set here. Default value is 0.3.
    codesamples: []
    type: double
    tags: []
    deprecationmessage: ''
    security:
      read: None
      write: None
    threadsafety: ReadSafe
    category: Appearance
    serialization:
      canload: true
      cansave: true
    capabilities:
      - Chat
  - name: ChatWindowConfiguration.Enabled
    summary: |
      Whether to show the default chat window.
    description: |
      Whether to show the default chat window. Set to false to hide.
    codesamples: []
    type: boolean
    tags: []
    deprecationmessage: ''
    security:
      read: None
      write: None
    threadsafety: ReadSafe
    category: Behavior
    serialization:
      canload: true
      cansave: true
    capabilities:
      - Chat
  - name: ChatWindowConfiguration.FontFace
    summary: |
      Font used to render text in the default chat window.
    description: |
      Font used to render text in the default chat window. Default is
      Enum.Font.BuilderSansMedium.
    codesamples: []
    type: Datatype.Font
    tags: []
    deprecationmessage: ''
    security:
      read: None
      write: None
    threadsafety: ReadSafe
    category: Appearance
    serialization:
      canload: true
      cansave: true
    capabilities:
      - Chat
  - name: ChatWindowConfiguration.HeightScale
    summary: |
      Factor by which the height of the default chat window should be scaled.
    description: |
      Factor by which the height of the default chat window should be scaled.
      Must be a value between 0.5 and 2. Defining a value outside of range
      clamps the actual value to the closest bound.
    codesamples: []
    type: float
    tags: []
    deprecationmessage: ''
    security:
      read: None
      write: None
    threadsafety: ReadSafe
    category: Behavior
    serialization:
      canload: true
      cansave: true
    capabilities:
      - Chat
  - name: ChatWindowConfiguration.HorizontalAlignment
    summary: |
      Horizontal alignment of the chat window.
    description: |
      Horizontal alignment of the chat window. Behaves similarly to
      Class.UIGridStyleLayout.HorizontalAlignment. Setting to
      Enum.HorizontalAlignment|Left or Enum.HorizontalAlignment|Right adding
      a small padding away from touching the corresponding horizontal edge of
      the screen. Setting to Enum.HorizontalAlignment|Center aligns the window
      in the horizontal middle of the screen. Default value is
      Enum.HorizontalAlignment|Left.
    codesamples: []
    type: HorizontalAlignment
    tags: []
    deprecationmessage: ''
    security:
      read: None
      write: None
    threadsafety: Unsafe
    category: Data
    serialization:
      canload: true
      cansave: true
    capabilities:
      - Chat
  - name: ChatWindowConfiguration.TextColor3
    summary: |
      Color of the text in default chat window.
    description: |
      Color of the text in default chat window. Default value is
      Datatype.Color3|Color3.new(255, 255, 255).
    codesamples: []
    type: Color3
    tags: []
    deprecationmessage: ''
    security:
      read: None
      write: None
    threadsafety: ReadSafe
    category: Appearance
    serialization:
      canload: true
      cansave: true
    capabilities:
      - Chat
  - name: ChatWindowConfiguration.TextSize
    summary: |
      Size of the text in default chat window.
    description: |
      Size of the text in default chat window. Default value is 14.
    codesamples: []
    type: int64
    tags: []

      write: None
    threadsafety: ReadSafe
    category: Appearance

      cansave: true
    capabilities:
      - Chat
  - name: ChatWindowConfiguration.TextStrokeColor3
    summary: |
      Color of the text stroke for text in default chat window.
    description: |
      Color of the text stroke for text in default chat window. Default value is
      Datatype.Color3|Color3.new(0, 0, 0).

      cansave: true

  - name: ChatWindowConfiguration.TextStrokeTransparency
    summary: |
      Transparency of the text stroke for text in default chat window.
    description: |
      Transparency of the text stroke for text in default chat window. Default
      value is 0.5.
    codesamples: []
    type: double
    tags: []

    serialization:
      canload: true
      cansave: true
    capabilities:
      - Chat
  - name: ChatWindowConfiguration.VerticalAlignment
    summary: |
      Vertical alignment of the chat window.
    description: |
      Vertical alignment of the chat window. Behaves similarly to
      Class.UIGridStyleLayout.VerticalAlignment. Setting to
      Enum.VerticalAlignment|Top or Enum.VerticalAlignment|Bottom adds a
      small padding away from touching the corresponding edge of the screen.
      Setting to Enum.VerticalAlignment|Center aligns the window in the
      vertical middle of the screen. Default value is
      Enum.VerticalAlignment|Top.
    codesamples: []

    summary: |
      Factor by which the width of the default chat window should be scaled.
    description: |
      Factor by which the width of the default chat window should be scaled.

    codesamples: []

methods:
  - name: ChatWindowConfiguration:DeriveNewMessageProperties
    summary: |
      Creates a new Class.ChatWindowMessageProperties instance that can be
      used to customize the appearance of messages in the chat window.
    description: |
      Creates a new Class.ChatWindowMessageProperties instance that can be
      used to customize the appearance of messages in the chat window.
      Class.ChatWindowMessageProperties inherits from
      Class.TextChatMessageProperties.

      This is intended to be used during custom
      Class.TextChatService.OnChatWindowAdded callbacks.

      lua
      local TextChatService = game:GetService("TextChatService")
      local ChatWindowConfiguration = TextChatService.ChatWindowConfiguration

      TextChatService.OnChatWindowAdded = function(textChatMessage)
        local properties = ChatWindowConfiguration:DeriveNewMessageProperties()

        if textChatMessage.Metadata == "Important" then
          properties.TextColor3 = Color3.fromRGB(255, 0, 0)
        end

        return properties
      end

    codesamples:
      - TextChatService-User-Chat
    parameters: []
    returns:
      - type: ChatWindowMessageProperties
        summary: ''
    tags: []
    deprecationmessage: ''
    security: None
    threadsafety: Unsafe
    capabilities:
      - Chat
events: []
callbacks: []
